amendment.description: Amendment prohibits any funds from being used to process applications for approval of patents, plans of operations, or amendments to plans in contravention of the opinion dated November 7, 1997, by the Solicitor of the Department of the Interior that limits the disposal of mining waste to five acres.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit any funds to be used to process applications for approval of patents, plans of operations, or amendments to plans in contravention of the opinion dated November 7, 1997, by the Solicitor of the Department of the Interior that limits the disposal of mining waste to five acres.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rahall amendment (A020) Agreed to by recorded vote: 273 - 151 (Roll no. 288).
